question: Which India state/UT has launched ‘E-filing consumer complaint system’?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of New Delhi Arvind Kejriwal has recently inaugurated the Delhi government's e-filing consumer complaint system.
The system is aimed at helping the people to file complaints through virtual mode. This digital service helps people maintain social distancing amidst the COVID-19 pandemic. In July, Delhi launched an e-RTI portal that will enable citizens to file online Right to Information (RTI).
